About

VegDroid is an experimental Android app to display nearby entries (mostly restaurants) of http://vegguide.org. It is provided free of charge.

Privacy

Each time nearby venues are listed, the current location is transferred to the vegguide.org server. No personally identifiable information is transmitted except the network addresses (eg. IP address) as required by the network protocols.

Source Code

The sources are accessible via https://github.com/thiemonagel/vegdroid. Patches and pull requests are welcome!
